name: Blockpocalypse
description: Blockpocalypse is the shared screen multiplayer party platformer about surviving with your friends... or at least outliving them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.8 GHz Core 2 Duo or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 500 Series, equivalent or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound or above Additional Notes: Best enjoyed with a Gamepad or Controller.
